| History                 = The Brethren of the Forgotten Flame was a cult modeled after the prehistoric [[Skrull]] fire cults.{{r|Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 6 13}} It was led by [[Talionis (Earth-616)|Sister Talionis]], although she only used the cult as a tool to further her ends during an alliance with [[Victor von Doom (Earth-616)|Doctor Doom]].{{r|Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 6 18}} Fueled by the formation of the [[Kree/Skrull Alliance (Earth-616)|Kree/Skrull Alliance]] and the collapse of the cosmic economy, Talionis turned the cult to the worship of [[Dormammu (Earth-616)|Dormammu]] to gain the power to destroy the universe.{{r|Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 6 13}}

Swaying [[Egros (Earth-616)|Ego the Living Planet]] to their cause, the Brethren of the Forgotten Flame had him displace to a specific location in the [[Galactic Rim]] to follow a prophetic ritual that required them to observe a constellation comprised of the brightest stars in three separate Skrullian constellations. When the time came, Talionis directed the rest of the Brethren of the Forgotten Flame in a self-sacrificial ritual that resulted in their blood turning into a black shell that enveloped the entirety of the planet.{{r|Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 6 14}} After days of incubation, a Dormammu-possessed Ego hatched from the egg.{{r|Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 6 15}}
